title: China’s Yulan Bond Sales Boom in Sign of Deeper Ties With Europe
description: A corner of China’s credit market is signaling the country’s closer ties with Europe, with a record amount of bonds issued via a mechanism established by the Shanghai Clearing House and its counterpart in Brussels.
content: A corner of China’s credit market is signaling the country’s closer ties with Europe, with a record amount of bonds issued via a mechanism established by the Shanghai Clearing House and its counterpart in Brussels.
